Name: pan-drmuhamadhabibb-la
Author: Dr. Muhamad Habib, Bhai Harpreet Singh, Maulana Wahiduddin Khan

Translations.Text: mai' unham di ibadata (suta prasati) nahim' karanga, jinham di upasana (buta-prasati) tusi' karade ho
Ate na tusim usa (alaha) di ibadata karana vale ho, jisa di ibadata maim karada ham
Ate mai' unham di ibadata karana vala nahim' ham, jinham di ibadata tusim kiti hai
Ate na tusim usa di ibadata karana vale ho, jisa di ibadata maim karada ham
Tuhade la'i tuhada dina ate mere la'i mera dina
Jadom alaha di madada a ga'i ate jita (ho ga'i)
Ate tusim dekhoge ki loka jathi'am de jathe alaha de dina vica samila ho rahe hana
Tam apane raba di sifata salaha karo, usa di prasasa de nala ate usa tom mu'afi mago. Besaka uha mu'afa karana vala hai
Abu lahaba de hatha tuta jana ate uha khatama ho jave
Na usa di ja'idada usa de kama a'i ate na uha jihara usa ne kama'i'a
Uha cheti hi bhatakadi ho'i aga vica digega
Usa di patani vi jihari sira te balana cuki phiradi hai
Usa di garadana vica vati ho'i rasi hai
